definition: consisting of or containing string or strings
details:
adjective
- consisting of or containing string or strings
- lean and sinewy
= synonyms: wiry
- forming viscous or glutinous threads
= synonyms: ropey, ropy, thready
- of meat, full of sinews
= example: of meat, full of sinews
= synonyms: sinewy, fibrous, unchewable
